review:
I, Jagannath,  under treatment of  Dr Amal Kumar  Khan for last 23 years.  I am so glad  that he explains  everything in details.  He is the most respectable and brilliant Doctor. His long experience and guidance shared to all the patients.

Booking system is very simple over phone.  His  valuable advice  over the problem is simply  acceptable . No hesitation over the quarry arries any doubt in mind. 
However, I say only one point just like "GOD". Lastly, all  are requested to meet once  for related to cardiology problem.

We had been to hospital and it was for  my father. He had heart related issue. I went for consultation. ****** *** **** *** ******* ***** Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. Cardiac test was done. I am satisfied with the treatment given.  I can recommend this doctor to my family or friends. Waiting time was there in hospital. My father is good now. Hospitality was good.

I took my parents for a check, especially for my father who had surgery a few weeks back. The way Dr. Khan was communicating with a patient I was utterly disappointed, he doesn't even have empathy and minimum courtesy to talk with a patient. ***** ******** *** ******* ****** * ******** ******** ** **** ********* ***** ** *** ******* **********. May be he had been a great surgeon *** ****** *** * ****** ** **** * ******* ************* His way of conveying facts is way too much harsh *** *** ****** ** ********* ****** ****** ******* BIG NO.
He was rude *** ********* *** ********.He was not ready to listen past record. I'm not recommend this doctor.
